Sambangi Luhut Pandjaitan, Prabowo Minta Saran Soal Pertahanan
07 Nov 2019, 13:41 by Caesar Akbar, Kodrat Setiawan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Menteri Pertahanan Prabowo Subianto bertandang ke Kantor Menteri Koordinator Bidang Kemaritiman dan Investasi Luhut Pandjaitan pada Kamis sore, 7 November 2019. Tak banyak bicara Prabowo yang mengenakan setelan kemeja berwarna krem mengatakan kedatangannya ke sana untuk rapat.
Tak begitu lama, Prabowo turun bersama Luhut dan menuju ke arah mobilnya. Kali itu lah ia menjelaskan maksud kedatangannya tersebut.
Bekas calon presiden itu mengatakan kunjungannya itu dilakukan sebagai junior Luhut dan rekan di Kabinet Indonesia Maju. "Beliau kan senior saya dan Menko Bidang Kemaritiman, saya tentunya minta saran, minta pemikiran beliau," kata Prabowo selepas kunjungannya.
Prabowo mengatakan di awal periode ini tengah melakukan kunjungan keliling ke semua menteri di kabinet pemerintahan Presiden Joko Widodo. Ia berjanji menyambangi satu per satu koleganya untuk meminta masukan masalah pertahanan.
Selain mengunjungi rekan-rekan menteri, Prabowo sebelumnya telah menyambangi PT Pindad. Selepas lawatannya, ia mengaku bangga dan mengatakan akan menjalankan instruksi presiden untuk membangun alat-alat pertahanan di dalam negeri.
Sebelumnya, Jokowi telah memerintahkan Prabowo untuk mengembangkan industri pertahanan strategis dalam negeri. Ia ingin Prabowo memanfaatkan dengan betul anggaran pertahanan sehingga bisa memenuhi minimum esensial force yang sudah ditetapkan.
"Sedapat mungkin jangan sampai kita impor semuanya. Harus di anggaran yang ada, harus dimanfaatkan untuk pengembangan industri strategis dari hulu sampai ke hilir," katanya dalam pengantar rapat terbatas Penyampaian Program dan Kegiatan di Bidang Politik, Hukum, dan Keamanan di Kantor Presiden, Jakarta, Kamis, 31 Oktober 2019.
Jokowi menginstruksikan pula untuk menjalin kerja sama dengan BUMN dan pihak swasta terkait pengembangan industri pertahanan dalam negeri ini. "Kita ingin agar produk-produk yang ada itu bisa kita ekspor," ujarnya.

CAESAR AKBAR | AHMAD FAIZ

Visiting Luhut Pandjaitan, Prabowo Asks for Defense Advice
Nov 7 2019, 13:41 by Caesar Akbar, Kodrat Setiawan
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Defense Minister Prabowo Subianto visited the Office of the Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs and Investment Luhut Pandjaitan on Thursday afternoon, November 7, 2019. Not much to say Prabowo, who was wearing a cream colored shirt, said he was there for a meeting.
Not so long ago, Prabowo got down with Luhut and headed towards his car. This time he explained the purpose of his arrival.
The former presidential candidate said his visit was carried out as a junior Luhut and a colleague in the Advanced Indonesian Cabinet. "He is my senior and the Coordinating Minister for Maritime Affairs, I certainly ask for advice, ask for his thoughts," said Prabowo after his visit.
Prabowo said that at the beginning of this period a visit was being made to all ministers in the government cabinet of President Joko Widodo. He promised to visit his colleagues one by one to ask for input on defense issues.
Besides visiting his fellow ministers, Prabowo had previously visited PT Pindad. After his trip, he claimed to be proud and said he would carry out the president's instructions to build defense equipment at home.
Previously, Jokowi had ordered Prabowo to develop the domestic strategic defense industry. He wants Prabowo to properly utilize the defense budget so that he can meet the minimum essential force that has been set.
"As far as possible we should not import everything. It must be in the existing budget, it must be utilized for the development of strategic industries from upstream to downstream," he said in the introduction to a limited meeting of Submission of Programs and Activities in the Field of Politics, Law and Security in the Office of the President, Jakarta , Thursday, October 31 2019.
Jokowi also instructed to establish cooperation with SOEs and private parties related to the development of the domestic defense industry. "We want to be able to export existing products," he said.

CAESAR AKBAR | AHMAD FAIZ
